Working plan signed 
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A Juche 90-92 (2001-2003) working plan for the implementation of the cultural agreement between the governments of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Syrian Arab Republic was signed here on Thursday.
 The plan was signed by hong son ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and Haissam Saad, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Syrian embassy here.

Kim Jong Il sends large buses to serve�@Pyongyangites
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il sent many large buses to serve Pyongyangites.
 Pyongyang citizens received these large buses at a time when they are significantly commemorating the first Sun's Day in the new century. These buses are associated with such fatherly loving care of the leader as sparing nothing for the people.    
 A ceremony of conveying the buses was held at Kim Il Sung Square yesterday.

"Biography of Kim Il Sung" vol. 4 published 
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- "Biography of Kim Il Sung" vol. 4 was brought out by the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House on the occasion of Sun's Day.
 The volume contains his revolutionary career and activities from October Juche 69 (1980) to December Juche 78 (1989).    
 The volume consisting of 10 chapters from 42 to 51 says that he wisely organized and led the struggle to open a decisive phase in vigorously accelerating the modelling of the whole society on the Juche idea and achieving the complete victory of socialism.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Vietnamese prime minister
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Phan Van Khai, prime minister of the government of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by Vo Hong Quang, vice-minister of culture and information who is leading the Vietnamese government cultural delegation to the 19th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Delegations of different political parties here
articles.content:
Delegation of SPA returns home
    Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK led by Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the presidium of the SPA which had participated in the 105th conference of the inter-parliamentary union held in Havana came back today.
 It was greeted at the airport by vice-chairman of the SPA Jang Chol and Esteban Lobaina Romero, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK.
